text: Lester Stefan Peltier (born 13 September 1988) is a Trinidadian international footballer who plays as a forward . ==Career== ===Club=== Peltier attended St. Anthony's College in Trinidad playing on his school's football team as the striker position.Club Brugge opportunity for Lester Peltier and had trials with Club Brugge, Arsenal, Millwall and Cardiff City.Lester Peltier earns trial at Arsenal In 2007, English Premiership club Portsmouth offered Peltier a four-year contract after a successful trial, but could not conclude the deal due to his failure to attain a work permit.Agent blasts T&T; over Peltier, Sky Sports. 3 August 2007. In April 2011 he signed with AS Trenčín and made his debut on 10 April 2011.http://www.socawarriors.net/foreign-based/foreign- based-news/foreign-based-news/8765-peltier-signs-with-fk-as-trenin.html On 19 June 2012, Slovan Bratislava confirmed the signing of Peltier from AS Trenčín on a four-year contract.Najdrahší prestup v histórii ligy, Slovan posilní Lester Peltier 19 June 2012, skslovan.com On 7 February 2016, Peltier signed for Irtysh Pavlodar of the Kazakhstan Premier League. Little over a week later, Peltier and Irtysh Pavlodar agreed to cancel his contract by mutual consent due to family circumstances. On 30 July 2018, Peltier re-joined Alashkert, but left the club 6-weeks later to join Saudi second tier club Al- Mujazzal. ===International=== He also represented Trinidad and Tobago at the Under 17, Under 20 levels and played for Scorpion United scoring 6 goals.Lester Peltier Profile, Socawarriors.net. 23 June 2008. Peltier made his international debut for the Trinidad and Tobago national football team on 26 January 2008 against Puerto Rico coming on as a substitute in the 46th minute.
